content.description: Climb up under the overhang to a good undercling. Walk your feet up, and commit to throwing for the lip. Match hands, campus up to a sloping arete to get your feet up, and it's over.
content.location: This ascends the obvious overhang in front of the Cockpit.

content.description:
A fun little problem. It makes me laugh every time. Start on good holds, throw a bomber right toe hook, let go with both hands, hang upside down, reposition, and pull for the lip. If you get the toe/foot hook right, the rest is easy. It starts as far into the little cave as possible. The starting holds are the jug on the left block and a slot located two and a half feet left of the jug.

youtube.com/watch?v=tiw20V2â€¦
content.location: To the left of the Sailor's Delight Block. Right before the low angle slab. Located in the little cave made by two blocks. Both blocks are on.
